title: Add repository README for experimental plugin marketplace
description: Create a README.md clarifying that this repository is experimental and intended as a shared repository for the prompt engineering team to collaborate on coding-agent plugins.
acceptance_criteria: README.md exists at repo root; README clearly states repo is experimental; README states it is a shared repo for prompt engineering team plugins.
notes: Validation: test -s README.md (pass). README contains explicit experimental + shared prompt engineering team plugin purpose statements.
